import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Navigation.css' import logoHome from "../images/mepelaozen.png" import whatsapp from "../images/whatsapp.png" import facebook from "../images/facebook.png" import instagram from "../images/instagram.png" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logoutUser } from '../store/AuthSlice' import { toast } from 'react-toastify' function Navigation() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [isOpen,setIsOpen] = useState(false) const toggleNav = () =>{ setIsOpen(!isOpen) } const {cartTotalQuantity} = useSelector((state)=>state.cart) const auth = useSelector((state)=>state.auth) return (
) } export default Navigation {/*
{auth._id ?
{auth.isAdmin ? מנהל : null}
{ dispatch(logoutUser(null)); toast.warning("יציאה!",{position:"bottom-center"}) }} >
:
התחברות הרשמה
}
Mac Watch Ipad Iphone AirPods Samsung אביזרים < Link to="/cart"> {cartTotalQuantity}
{isOpen && ( <>
{auth._id ?
{auth.isAdmin ? מנהל : null}
{ dispatch(logoutUser(null)); toast.warning("יציאה!",{position:"bottom-center"}) }} >
:
התחברות הרשמה
} Mac Watch Ipad Iphone AirPods Samsung אביזרים < Link to="/cart"> {cartTotalQuantity}
)} */}
